mapper.insert: insert into audio_feature(audio_id, feature_version, feature_data, created_at, last_used_at, audio_text, probability) VALUES (#{audioId},#{featureVersion},#{featureData},#{createdAt},#{lastUsedAt},#{audioText},#{probability})
mapper.select: select id, audio_id, feature_version, feature_data, created_at, last_used_at, audio_text from audio_feature where audio_id = #{audioId}
